item.title: Who's using Tranquilpeak Hugo Theme
item.description:
Here you can find a list of the blogs that use Tranquilpeak theme, with different styles and customizations.

If you want to add your site to this showcase, click here and fill the following information:

  • public url
  • name (optional)
  • description (optional)

Eric Bouchut’s blog

Robin Hu’s blog

Zentechnista’s blog

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description:
Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Paragraph

item.title: Hidden social section showcase
item.description:
This post is used to show how a site looks if the social section is hidden.

In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae, eleifend ac, enim. Aliquam lorem ante, dapibus in, viverra quis, feugiat a, tellus.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description:
Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

Youtube

Vimeo
